System.M_MSG001: SELECT MSG_CD AS MSG_CD, MSG1 AS MSG_TEXT1, MSG2 AS MSG_TEXT2, MSG3 AS MSG_TEXT3, MSG4 AS MSG_TEXT4, BUTTON_TYPE AS MSG_BTN FROM M_MSG ORDER BY MSG_CD
System.M_MSG500: SELECT MSG_CD AS MSG_CD, MSG1 AS MSG_TEXT1, MSG2 AS MSG_TEXT2, MSG3 AS MSG_TEXT3, MSG4 AS MSG_TEXT4, BUTTON_TYPE AS MSG_BTN FROM M_MSG ORDER BY MSG_CD
